title.name: Apparaat naam
message.connectedTo: Uw DiPi Car is verbonded met {net}
error.nolink: You are not connected to your DiPi Car.
text.notConnectedEmpty: In your Wi-Fi settings, select "DiPi Net" and enter the network password.
text.notConnectedKnown: We couldn't locate your car. Make sure it is active, then try again.{rtn}{rtn}You can also reconfigure settings from local access. Connect to "DiPi Net" and continue.
text.home_1: You are connected to the car!{rtn}{rtn}First, you must choose the type of connexion you want to use to control the car.
text.home_2: Using the local mode, you can use your car from a local network using a wireless connexion.
text.home_3: To use the car over the local network, please enter your Wi-Fi settings.
text.home_4: Your car deserves a unique name. How would you like to name it?
text.home_6: Your DiPi Car saves and applies the configuration.{rtn}{rtn}Please keep waiting, and stay connected to the car
text.home_6.5: The configuration is complete! You can now connect to your local network and continue.
text.home_7: Please insert the address of your car to connect. Check the numbers displayed on the screen.
text.addUser: You must select an existing profile or create a new one to use the DiPi Car
text.oobe: Discover how you can build your DiPi Car with our guide.
text.firstboot: Would you like to share your experience with us?
text.minimalUI: Reduce displayed elements of the UI
text.localModeNotAvailable: Discover how you can enable and configure access from your local network on our documentation.
text.knownHost: This device is actually known as {host}. You may change it later from the settings.
hover.name: Name
tip.stats: See the statistics from your profile
tip.conf: Manage the app and the car
controls.tiptouch: Tip: The farther your finger is from the center of the joystick, the faster you'll get.
controls.tipkb: Info: You can edit the keyboard layout from the settings.
exp.ini: Here you are in DiPi Link, the app built to work with your DiPi Car
exp.b1: After this tour, you will get the video stream and you will get control of your car. You're at the right place.
exp.b2: Here are the base controls for the vehicle.
exp.b3: Find statistics about your usage of the car. The more you use the app, the more you'll progress.
exp.b4: You'll be able to personalize the app, edit the name and change the behavior of the car as you want.
exp.b5: You're now ready. Let's go and discover the driving experience!
codeview.text: With Codeview, you'll start coding your own moves
codeview.placeholder: Hello World - Start writing some code here
